snippet.title: Fiend Legion PC version coming soon to Steam!
snippet.description: Fiend Legion (PC version) is coming to Steam in Q4 2019! New features includes: Single player challenge mode, 90+ new cards, beautifully crafted new levels, new heroes and meticulously balanced cards so it's never pay to win. Fiend Legion is a real test of strategy and skills for players at all levels. Subscribe to our Youtube channel for game updates, or find us on Twitter @FiendLegionGame, Facebook @FiendLegionGame or Discord.
